itemDescription: English cricketer and rugby union footballer (born 1940)

wikipedia_page.main: Patrick David Briggs (born 24 August 1940) is an English former cricketer, rugby player and school headmaster.

response: *Patrick Briggs (born 1940), English cricketer, rugby player and school headmaster

link_mentions.page: List of Bedfordshire County Cricket Club List A players
response: | Patrick Briggs || 1970–1971 || 2 || Played first-class cricket for Cambridge University in 1963 and 1964 and Minor Counties cricket for Cheshire between 1960 and 1968, for whom he also made two List A appearances for. Played for Bedfordshire between 1969 and 1973. || Patrick Briggs, CricketArchive. Retrieved 2019-08-15.
